text: I've come across an issue where the build system uses `-I/usr/include/` instead of `-I/home/user/blah/usr/include` where blah is a prefix (so like a chroot without chrooting in). This results in headers not being found if ex. mbedtls is installed only in this prefix, and not on the host system.
